member.name: class
member.summary: A data directory entry is a row in the data directory table in a PE file that refers to one of 16 predefined tables.
member.remarks: The table of directories start at offset 96 in a 32bit PE and 112 in a 64bit PE.

member.name: ctor
member.param: The byte data to populate the instance with

member.name: ctor2
member.param: The byte data to populate the instance with
